rules.active: Cast this card only during your turn. At the start of your next turn, teleport to safety and leave behind a piece of valuable loot.
At the start of your turn during combat, return all Blue cards you've cast this session to your hand.

details.flavour: You've got nice moves, but you won't be able to keep up for long.

details.rules: Move any number of other allied characters out of combat.
details.flavour: Let's make some space- this is about to get rowdy.
